lines: Amufimba no luse lwakwe; Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.
Lintu twakumana, bonse fye kuli Yesu;
2. Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane, Amufimba na mapindo,
Amwikushisha na mana; Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane
3. Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane, Lintu muli mumacusho,
Alemukumba nshiku pe, Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.
4. Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane, Amwisusha no kutemwa,
A-lesha imfwa kuli mwe, Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.
